bibl.title: Ancient Gold Extraction at Bir Umm Fawakhir.
bibl.note: Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago, Bir Umm Fawakhir Project, 1992-. - The most complete evidence comes from the large 5th-6th century A.D. Coptic/Byzantine settlement. There is some evidence for earlier workings at the near-by mines in the Wadi el Sid.
bibl.seg: MEYER Carol, Bryan EARL, Mohamed OMAR and Robert K. SMITHER, Ancient Gold Extraction at Bir Umm Fawakhir.

Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago, Bir Umm Fawakhir Project, 1992-. - The most complete evidence comes from the large 5th-6th century A.D. Coptic/Byzantine settlement. There is some evidence for earlier workings at the near-by mines in the Wadi el Sid.
